body_html: The error is still printed in v1.10.1. Ideal fix would be to redirect stderr in the respective run_shell command in configure.py. For myself, I added sys.stderr.write(' *** The above error message can be safely ignored. *** ') in the except block.
body_text:
The error is still printed in v1.10.1. Ideal fix would be to redirect stderr in the respective run_shell command in configure.py. For myself, I added sys.stderr.write('
*** The above error message can be safely ignored. ***

') in the except block.
body:
The error is still printed in v1.10.1. Ideal fix would be to redirect stderr in the respective `run_shell` command in `configure.py`. For myself, I added `sys.stderr.write('
*** The above error message can be safely ignored. ***

')` in the `except` block.
